question: Nowadays many people want to buy famous brands of clothes, cars   and other items, what are the reasons for this, do you think it is a positive or negative development?
text: To start with, purchasing such kind of brands clothing and any other items is most widespread condition in present life, all causes related to seem wealthy and fashionable, it provide with also pros and cons,

First of all, acquiring prevalent brands is strongly considered to develop the economy of the government, this is illustrated by extended brands such as Gucci Ferrari apple, they are high costly, there is no doubt that fashionable brands exactly help to gain tremendous circle of money, in other benefits, people seems more superb and prodigious with a kind of expensive clothes, the most suitable point is that the cost is equal to value and quality, because they are imported from the well organized and well known companies.

Second of all, also some drawbacks can be clearly seen here, for instance. Brands easily can compare individuals between poverty and richness, to put it other ways poor masses cannot afford to purchase the most expensive branded products. The fact the police department proves that people who do not have enough fund to buy brands objects, they may steal money for acquiring fashions,
To sum up, people do not have to wear or drive fashionable things, they can save their salaries with no wearing them, in other sides brands significantly help the government with countless funds,
